name: I'll See You In Time
description:
Star is stuck in the past, and frozen in time.

Manipulate objects in the past and set them in motion in the present.

Reach the control panel and the time machine to bring your partner closer to the present.

Use cubes and spheres to push the buttons that power the control panel.

Art by Adam Ploskonka

Controls:

A/D - Move

W - Jump

T - Change time

Left-click - (As Star) pick up and place physics objects

Right-click - (As Star) switch the mode of physics objects

Right-click - (As Cross) use the control panel and advance to the next level

R - Restart level

Esc - Quit

Known Issues:

- Standing on spheres is pretty janky

- Game was built for 16:10 aspect ratios; you may see more/less than you're supposed to
